scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:js
scripts.build:docs:docusaurus: npm run prepare:docs && cd docs && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs:typedoc && npm run build:docs:docusaurus
scripts.packages:common:build: cd packages/common && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:lint: cd packages/common && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:prepack: npm run packages:common:ci && npm run packages:common:test && npm run packages:common:build  && npm run packages:common:lint
scripts.packages:common:pack: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm pack && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:publish:npm: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:publish:npm:next: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm publish --tag next && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:publish:npm:beta: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm publish --tag beta && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:publish:npm:alpha: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm publish --tag alpha && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:publish:gpr: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm publish --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com/ && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:publish:gpr:next: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm publish --tag next --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com/ && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:publish:gpr:beta: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm publish --tag beta --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com/ && cd ../..
scripts.packages:common:publish:gpr:alpha: npm run packages:common:prepack && cd packages/common && npm publish --tag alpha --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com/ && cd ../..
scripts.packages:types:build: cd packages/types && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.packages:types:lint: cd packages/types && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.packages:types:prepack: npm run prepack && npm run packages:types:test && npm run packages:types:build  && npm run packages:types:lint
scripts.packages:types:pack: npm run packages:types:prepack && cd packages/types && npm pack --pack-destination ../../build && cd ../..
scripts.packages:types:publish: npm run packages:types:prepack && cd packages/types && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.packages:types:publish:next: npm run packages:types:prepack && cd packages/types && npm publish --tag next && cd ../..
scripts.packages:types:publish:beta: npm run packages:types:prepack && cd packages/types && npm publish --tag beta && cd ../..
scripts.packages:types:publish:alpha: npm run packages:types:prepack && cd packages/types && npm publish --tag alpha && cd ../..
